meanings.definition: To blend or grind (food) into a thick, smooth liquid
meanings.sent1: She pureed the fruits to make a delicious smoothie.
meanings.sent2: The chef pureed the vegetables to make a creamy soup.
meanings.sent3: After accidentally pureeing his sandwich, he decided to stick to making smoothies.
meanings.sent4: The blender whirred loudly as it pureed the ingredients into a silky texture.
meanings.sent5: The baby food was pureed to perfection, making it easy for the little one to eat.

meanings.definition: A food that has been pureed
meanings.sent1: The hospital served pureed carrots to the patients.
meanings.sent2: She bought a jar of pureed peas for her baby.
meanings.sent3: The pureed apples looked like a colorful mush on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The pureed pumpkin had a velvety texture that melted in the mouth.
meanings.sent5: The chef garnished the dish with a dollop of pureed sweet potatoes.
